Paleces.name: Hong Kong
Paleces.description: A special administrative region on the eastern side of the Pearl River estuary in southern China.

Paleces.name: Macau
Paleces.description: A special administrative region on the western side of the Pearl River estuary in southern China.

Paleces.name: Thailand
Paleces.description: A country at the centre of the Southeast Asian Indochinese peninsula composed of 76 provinces.

Paleces.name: Japan
Paleces.description: An island country in East Asia.

Paleces.name: Vietnam
Paleces.description: The easternmost country on the Indochina Peninsula.
